homePage.subtitle: the most reliable multi-profile exporter & importer from Egypt and many other countries
homePage.block1-tile: We work with more than 50 countries worldwide:
homePage.redInfoText: We work with products that undergo all stages of quality inspection
homePage.prefooter-title: Currently, environmentally friendly fruits and vegetables are available for export

about-us.red-info: Our idea was to provide people with high-quality products at affordable prices
about-us.component1: The holding was established in 2013 by Ali Noureldeen and Anna Abuladze
about-us.component2-1: Ali directly oversees all stages of production, quality checks, and logistics
about-us.component2-2: Anna handles negotiations with partners, as well as PR and marketing

partnership.text-1: Delivery is carried out weekly by sea to all countries around the world, and there's also air delivery. We take care of all calculations and logistics, while you enjoy high-quality fruits and vegetables
partnership.text-2: We operate through bank accreditations, providing a sense of security to our partners
partnership.title: Minimum Order

contacts.subtitle: And we will call you back within an hour
contacts.name: Name

products.description: Order at least one container, different combinations are possible.
